title: Replace broken Valentine flow GIF URLs with user-provided Tenor links

requirements.summary: Replace non-loading GIF URLs on the specified Valentine flow screens (1st, 3rd, 4th, 6th, 7th, last) with the exact user-provided Tenor URLs while keeping flow/navigation and error-handling unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/features/valentine/content/assets.ts, set ASSETS.welcomeGif (screen 1: welcome) to exactly: https://media.tenor.com/ZKsi3WzsGKwAAAAi/bubu-dudu-bear-and-panda.gif

In frontend/src/features/valentine/content/assets.ts, set the GIF used by the 3rd screen (congratulations) to exactly: https://media.tenor.com/lrtN5Vp1muUAAAAi/dancing-bears-peach-goma-ositos-bailando.gif

The 4th screen (gifts / ChooseYourGiftScreen) uses a dedicated GIF URL that is exactly: https://media.tenor.com/8Y5suXxoCOgAAAAi/bubu-dudu-sseeyall.gif (do not reuse the congratulations GIF for this screen)
In frontend/src/features/valentine/content/assets.ts, set ASSETS.kissGif (screen 6: gift2) to exactly: https://tenor.com/view/bubu-dudu-stickers-cute-love-gif-26543449
In frontend/src/features/valentine/content/assets.ts, set ASSETS.gift3Gif (screen 7: gift3) to exactly: https://media.tenor.com/n4IJmAXgRHwAAAAi/peach-and.gif
In frontend/src/features/valentine/content/assets.ts, set ASSETS.finalSurpriseGif (last screen: finalSurprise) to exactly: https://media.tenor.com/puetEXNh7mcAAAAi/bubu-bubu-dudu.gif
All affected screens display their GIF using the existing ValentineGif error-handling behavior (fallback text shows if the image fails to load), and no user-facing text is changed away from English.

file_operations.description: Update the configured Tenor GIF URLs to the exact user-provided URLs for: ASSETS.welcomeGif (welcome), ASSETS.congratulationsGif (congratulations), ASSETS.kissGif (gift2), ASSETS.gift3Gif (gift3), and ASSETS.finalSurpriseGif (finalSurprise). Add a new dedicated asset key for the gifts screen GIF (e.g., ASSETS.giftsGif) set to exactly https://media.tenor.com/8Y5suXxoCOgAAAAi/bubu-dudu-sseeyall.gif so the gifts screen does not reuse the congratulations GIF.

Wire the gifts screen to use the new dedicated gifts GIF asset (e.g., ASSETS.giftsGif) instead of ASSETS.congratulationsGif, ensuring it continues to render via the existing ValentineGif component (preserving current error-handling and fallback behavior) and without changing any user-facing text.
